entry.title: DGSSI CTF PRO 2024 - Italy Writeup
entry.summary: The lab was included in the professional DGSSI CTF hosed in SecDojo platform on February 7, 2024. https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/dgssi-ctf-2024/ Naples machine We start our enumeration with a Nmap scan to identify services. entry.title: Discourse CVE-2023-47119 - Building a CVE POC from commits changes

link.title: Discourse CVE-2023-47119 - Building a CVE POC from commits changes

entry.summary: I was checking for some Discourse vulnerabilities, and I saw that a new CVE was dropped on 11/10/2023 CVE-2023-47119 The details didn’t mention any POC, so I did some analysis based on the source code commits changes to understand the vulnerability and how it is possible to exploit it. The article includes details, lab setup and a demo. A GitHub repository was created for the POC https://gi...

entry.title: Bypass captcha using OCR on Dolibarr login page

link.title: Bypass captcha using OCR on Dolibarr login page

entry.summary: Today i’m going to explain how i was able to bypass captcha using OCR on Dolibarr login page, and create a script for it. Output : I published the tool with the name DoliBrute. entry.title: IoT Pentesting with Teltonika RUT9XX
entry.summary: Today we are going to practice some IoT pentesting with a device called RUT950 as an example. I’ll explain different techniques used in IoT pentesting including emulation, firmware analysis, exploitation and pivoting. This article was made for a hack event organised by The hacking News B’Darija. Disclaimer All information and software available on this page are for educational purposes only...
